mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SUPPORTERS_UPLOAD s INNER JOIN THEMA t ON s.THEMANUM=t.THEMANUM INNER JOIN INFO_UPLOAD i ON t.THEMANUM=i.THEMANUM INNER JOIN SUB_LOCATION sl ON i.SUBLOCALNUM=sl.SUBLOCALNUM INNER JOIN INFO_UPLOAD_IMG img IN i.INFOUPNUM=img.INFONUM INNER JOIN LOCATION lo ON sl.SUBLOCALNUM=lo.SUBLOCALNUM

SELECT * FROM SUPPORTERS_UPLOAD s INNER JOIN THEMA t ON s.THEMANUM=t.THEMANUM INNER JOIN INFO_UPLOAD i ON t.THEMANUM=i.THEMANUM INNER JOIN SUB_LOCATION sl ON i.SUBLOCALNUM=sl.SUBLOCALNUM INNER JOIN INFO_UPLOAD_IMG img IN i.INFOUPNUM=img.INFONUM INNER JOIN LOCATION lo ON sl.SUBLOCALNUM=lo.SUBLOCALNUM WHERE i.THEMANUM=#{themaNum} OR t.THEMANUMREF=#{themaNumRef}
SELECT * FROM INFO_UPLOAD i INNER JOIN THEMA t ON i.THEMANUM = t.THEMANUM WHERE i.THEMANUM=#{themaNum}
